nodes.bodyText: This λ/Δλ stuff seems unrelated to #6896. @JayanthyChengan do you mean for this to be in the pull request?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -31,7 +31,7 @@ datasetfieldtype.astroFacility.description=The observatory or facility where the
 datasetfieldtype.astroInstrument.description=The instrument used to collect the data.

 datasetfieldtype.resolution.Spatial.description=The spatial (angular) resolution that is typical of the observations, in decimal degrees.
-datasetfieldtype.resolution.Spectral.description=The spectral resolution that is typical of the observations, given as the ratio λ/Δλ.
+datasetfieldtype.resolution.Spectral.description=The spectral resolution that is typical of the observations, given as the ratio \u03bb/\u0394\u03bb.

nodes.bodyText: @JayanthyChengan thanks. @jggautier and I took a look at the demo server and you're right, this absolutely should be fixed! I'm putting a screenshot below for QA. Should it be fixed in astrophysics.tsv as well?

nodes.bodyText: @JayanthyChengan this looks fine but do you have any insight into the fact that the longer version appears above  while the shorter version appears below? Is this by design? Here's a screenshot:

commit.message: datasetRelatedPublication title and description are fetched from Resource Bundle files.

Merge pull request #75 from IQSS/6904-add-release-note

add release note #6896
datasetRelatedPublication title and description are fetched from Resource Bundle files.
